amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in House Report 115-259 to increase funds for the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account by $986,292,000 and decrease funds for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $634,600,000 and reduce the National Nuclear Security Administration Weapons Activities account by $352,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Polis.
